metadata.synopsis: Player put on mask and is hearing auntie's voice telepathically booming around them.
metadata.how_to_trigger: debugbook to the hag lair entrancewalk in to the pit and speak to the hagshe will poof awaymove towards the large dooron your right there is a table with masksequip one of them to trigger

1.text: Hello, petal. My, my - the mask suits you. Just relax. See the world with fresh eyes.

0.text: And let your dear old Auntie Ethel look after you.
